title: Nicky: one of my best friends
creator_credit: Anthony Jones, Grania Gurievitch, McGraw-Hill Films and Togg Films
brief_description: Nicky is a blind boy who also suffers from cerebral palsy. This film shows him at home with his family and at school with his friends. Nicky attends a normal school because his parents feel that he would benefit more by being in the mainstream.
